title: 西天乡村俱乐部 组件
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:flowergarden]]

[[module css]]
@import url(https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/hoah2333/Fonts@main/Typeface-sucaijishikufangti.css);

.collapsible-block a, li, p, .f-content, .footnote-footer {
    line-height: 1.6;
}

/* 部分翻译以及字体选择参考花园版式。 */

/* 为GOI格式部分的展示效果，同步了韩分基板的行距修改。 */

/* 引用的字体为免费商用授权。 */

[[/module]]

[[iftags +组件]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start-standalone]]
**西天乡村俱乐部 组件**

**作者：** [[*user thd-glasses]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="border-radius: 15px; border:solid 3px #663333; background-color: #DDDDDD; width: 250px; margin: auto; padding: 0px; text-align: center;"]]
+++++* [[[thd-glasses-hub|thd-glasses的作者页]]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end-standalone]]

该组件用于[[[seocheon-cc-hub|西天乡村俱乐部]]]的GOI格式。
[[div class="blockquote codequote"]]
@@[[include component:scc-format@@ part=**a** or **b**]]
[[/div]]
[[/iftags]]

[[div style="display: none; displ{$part}y: block; text-align: center;"]]
**[[span style="font-family: 'ZoomlaMengyas-A080',  'GabiaBombaram', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 25px; color: #0B7903;"]]-- 西天会员名录 --[[/span]]**
[[div style="border-bottom: solid 2px darkgreen; margin-bottom:1px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="border-bottom: solid 1px darkgreen; margin-bottom:1px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="font-family: 'sucaijishikufangti', "EBSHunminjeongeumSBA", verdana, arial, helvetica, "Nanum Gothic", sans-serif; font: font-size:10.5px; text-align: center; color:#777777;"]]
//本语音书卷记录了客户的重要个人信息。//
//让我们成为严格保护隐私、值得客户信赖的西天CC。//
[[/div]]
[[div style="border-bottom: solid 1px darkgreen; margin-bottom:1px;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[/div]]

[[div style="display: none; display: {$part}lock; text-align: center;"]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="border-bottom: solid 2px darkgreen; margin-bottom:1px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="border-bottom: solid 1px darkgreen; margin-bottom:1px;"]]
[[/div]]
**[[span style="font-family: 'ZoomlaMengyas-A080',  'GabiaBombaram', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; color: #0B7903;"]]西天乡村俱乐部[[/span]]**
**[[span style="font-family: 'ZoomlaMengyas-A080',  'GabiaBombaram', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8px; color: #2F9D27;"]]圣洁修身 • 芬芳休养 • 吉祥社交[[/span]]**
[[/div]]
author: Sharia Vanilla
